title: The Magical Powder
synopsis: The Magical Powder is a teaching story which I was told in 1984, as described at the following link, where I told the story of the circumstances in which I was first told the story, and told the story. A Story About sustainable History-

title: The Third System
synopsis: There are three convenient stages of human growth: infancy, adolescence and adulthood, which provide us with an adequate comparison standard for three stages of community development.

title: Welcome Visitors
synopsis: [[The Third System]] is the title of a short piece written by Idries Shah in his book [http://www.idriesshahfoundation.org/read-online/read-knowing-how-to-know/ Knowing How To Know].
